reviewText: Great comedy from a great stand-up comedien. Most of this DVD is extremely funny, and the rest is very funny. I enjoyed every minute of it, including the extras, with the immensely funny song, "Is This Thing On? "
Comedy? Garbage in a Sentence... An that's the Joke!
DVD started skipping half way through. I played with it for about an hour, but would not stop skipping.
Not as good as his earlier stuff. Not for family viewing. Threw it in the garbage don't waste your money

I like Dom and love his comedy. This DVD is not well produced.  Some recordings are not very audible. Its like someone in the audience recorded the show. I wish the DVD contained professionally produced appearences.

I love Dom...always have since i first saw him years ago.  i thought this would be a complete stand-up show, but it is not.  It jumps around with him doing one liners but there is no buildup so you might laugh...,or not.  Doesn't do him justice.
one of my all time favorite comedians...this DVD doesn't disappoint!  Loved it!  FUNNY,FUNNY,FUNNY!
My Dad is a big fan of Dom Irrera and I purchased this as a gift. Everyone enjoyed it!

Dom has got to be one of the funniest people on earth.  I've seen him in person at a Boston comedy club, and you just laugh so hard that it hurts.

I would recommend this DVD to every person who loves comedy, of course it's more for adults than children, that's for sure!
